Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

Projeta um som em um raio de {hexrad} hex que causa {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] de dano com [abilityred]Alto Impacto[/abilityred] às unidades na área.[br/] Unidades não-etéreas têm {DisorientedChance}[strengthPhysical/] de chance de força de ficarem [abilityred]Desorientadas[/abilityred], dando à unidade {FumbleChance}% de chance de falha em seus ataques por {Duration}[turn/].
Disoriented is a status effect whose description can be found in StatusEffects_UnitProperties_DLC04
Uma frequência sônica especial atinge alvos em um raio de {hexrad} hex, causando {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] de dano e destruindo {ShieldAmount}[shield/] até o fim do combate.

ss:Data.Font: This needs clarification: does it deal damage and destroy shields
until the end of combat? As it's written now, it makes no sense.

Cell.Data: Tenta aplicar [abilityred]Reverberação[/abilityred] {ReverbAmount} vezes a todas as unidades em um raio de {HexRadius} hex. Cada tentativa tem {ReverbChance}[strengthphysical/] de chance de força de ser bem-sucedida, aplicando [abilityred]Ressonância[/abilityred] em caso de falha. Se uma unidade tiver {StackAmount} pilhas de reverberação, ela explode causando dano a si mesma e a unidades adjacentes por {ReverbDamage}[damagePhysical/].
Reverb is a status effect whose description can be found in StatusEffects_UnitProperties_DLC04

Ao final de cada turno inimigo, por {Duration}[turn/], todas as unidades inimigas sofrem {SoundDamage}[damagePhysical/] e ganham [abilityred]Ressonância[/abilityred], reduzindo sua [damagePhysical/] resistência por {ResonanceDuration}[turn/].
Resonance is a status effect whose description can be found in StatusEffects_UnitProperties_DLC04
